001package edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.adapter;
002
003import android.content.Context;
004import android.graphics.drawable.Drawable;
005import android.view.View;
006import android.view.View.OnClickListener;
007import android.widget.TextView;
008import com.kizitonwose.calendar.core.CalendarDay;
009import com.kizitonwose.calendar.core.DayPosition;
010import com.kizitonwose.calendar.view.MonthDayBinder;
011import com.kizitonwose.calendar.view.ViewContainer;
012import dagger.hilt.android.qualifiers.ActivityContext;
013import dagger.hilt.android.scopes.FragmentScoped;
014import edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.R;
015import edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.databinding.DayCalendarBinding;
016import edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.model.entity.Apod;
017import java.time.LocalDate;
018import java.util.HashMap;
019import java.util.Map;
020import javax.inject.Inject;
021import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
022
023@FragmentScoped
024public class DayBinder implements MonthDayBinder<ViewContainer> {
025
026  private static final String TAG = DayBinder.class.getSimpleName();
027
028  private final Map<LocalDate, Apod> apodMap;
029  /*  private final Drawable selectedCircle;
030    private final Drawable rangeCircle;*/
031  private final String apodTooltipFormat;
032  private final String[] mediaTypes;
033
034  private OnApodClickListener listener;
035
036  @Inject
037  public DayBinder(@ActivityContext Context context) {
038    this.apodMap = new HashMap<>();
039    apodTooltipFormat = context.getString(R.string.apod_tooltip_format);
040    mediaTypes = context
041        .getResources()
042        .getStringArray(R.array.media_types);
043    listener = (apod) -> {
044    };
045  }
046//    selectedCircle = context.getDrawable(R.drawable.selected_date_circle);
047//    rangeCircle = context.getDrawable(R.drawable.circle_background);
048
049  @Override
050  public ViewContainer create(@NotNull View view) {
051    return new DayHolder(view);
052  }
053
054  @Override
055  public void bind(@NotNull ViewContainer container, CalendarDay calendarDay) {
056    ((DayHolder) container).bind(calendarDay);
057  }
058
059  public Map<LocalDate, Apod> getApodMap() {
060    return apodMap;
061  }
062
063  public void setListener(OnApodClickListener listener) {
064    this.listener = listener;
065  }
066
067  @FunctionalInterface
068  public interface OnApodClickListener {
069
070    void onApodClick(Apod apod);
071  }
072
073
074  public class DayHolder extends ViewContainer {
075
076    private static final OnClickListener NO_OP_LISTENER = (v) -> {
077    };
078
079    private final DayCalendarBinding binding;
080    private final Drawable clickableBackground;
081
082    private Apod apod;
083
084    public DayHolder(@NotNull View view) {
085      super(view);
086      binding = DayCalendarBinding.bind(view);
087      clickableBackground = view.getBackground();
088    }
089
090    public void bind(CalendarDay calendarDay) {
091      TextView dayText = binding.getRoot();
092      dayText.setText(String.valueOf(calendarDay.getDate().getDayOfMonth()));
093      // TODO: 2025-02-28 Use information from apodMap to modify style/content of widgets.
094      Apod apod = apodMap.get(calendarDay.getDate());
095      if (apod != null) {
096        this.apod = apod;
097        dayText.setClickable(true);
098        dayText.setFocusable(true);
099        dayText.setSoundEffectsEnabled(true);
100        dayText.setOnClickListener(this::translateClick);
101        dayText.setBackground(clickableBackground);
102        dayText.setTextAppearance(
103            (calendarDay.getPosition() == DayPosition.MonthDate)
104                ? R.style.CalendarTextAppearance_AvailableDay
105                : R.style.CalendarTextAppearance_AvailableDay_OutOfMonth
106        );
107        dayText.setTooltipText(String.format(apodTooltipFormat,
108            mediaTypes[apod.getMediaType().ordinal()], apod.getTitle().strip()));
109      } else {
110        this.apod = null;
111        dayText.setClickable(false);
112        dayText.setFocusable(false);
113        dayText.setSoundEffectsEnabled(false);
114        dayText.setOnClickListener(NO_OP_LISTENER);
115        dayText.setBackground(null);
116        dayText.setTextAppearance(R.style.CalendarTextAppearance);
117        dayText.setTooltipText(null);
118      }
119    }
120
121    private void translateClick(View view) {
122      listener.onApodClick(apod);
123    }
124  }
125
126}
